thread.title: 5 People Killed At Ft. Lauderdale Airport, Here’s Where Obama Went Immediately After…
thread.title_full: 5 People Killed At Ft. Lauderdale Airport, Here’s Where Obama Went Immediately After…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: 5 People Killed At Ft. Lauderdale Airport, Here’s Where Obama Went Immediately After…
text:
Looks like President Obama is enjoying the last couple weeks of his presidency. 
He was down in Florida this week. 
No, not to comfort the families of the 5 people gunned down at the Fort Lauderdale airport. 
He was hanging out with one of his old golf buddies. 
From The Daily Mail : President Barack Obama flew to Florida to attend the wedding of his longtime staffer and most frequent golf partner, just hours after his star-studded farewell bash came to an end at 4am. Obama arrived at the Jacksonville International Airport on Saturday just in time to see Marvin Nicholson, the White House trip director and the president’s personal aide, marry the love of his life. Nicholson and Helen Pajcic tied the knot at a private evening ceremony in Jacksonville at the One Ocean Resort and Spa. Pajcic is the daughter of a longtime Obama fundraiser and – according to her LinkedIn profile – a special assistant at the Education Department. Obama has played 333 rounds of golf since taking office and Nicholson has joined in for 192 of them, making him the president’s most frequent golf buddy. Meanwhile, more than 300 miles away, families are mourning the loss of their loved ones after a gunman opened fire at the Ft Lauderdale Hollywood Airport. Five people died and six more were injured in the shooting that occurred around 1pm on Friday. 
President Obama has never understood optics. 
He did this kind of thing constantly over the last 8 years. 
Remember when he went golfing right after James Foley was beheaded? 
The guy just doesn’t have a clue how bad this kind of thing looks. 
Or he doesn’t care. 
Either way, it’s not good. LIKE this article?
